name: DICOM_Color_Palattes_UIDs
title: DICOM® Standard Color Palettes
description: DICOM® Standard Color Palettes from DICOM PS3.6 Table B-1-1.

concept.definition: Hot Iron (HOT_IRON) from section B.1.1. See also ftp://medical.nema.org/Medical/Dicom/Palettes/hotiron.dcm
PET (PET) from section B.1.2. See also ftp://medical.nema.org/Medical/Dicom/Palettes/pet.dcm
Hot Metal Blue (HOT_METAL_BLUE) from section B.1.3. See also ftp://medical.nema.org/Medical/Dicom/Palettes/hotmetalblue.dcm
PET 20 Step (PET_20_STEP) from section B.1.4. See also ftp://medical.nema.org/Medical/Dicom/Palettes/pet20step.dcm
Spring (SPRING) from section B.1.5. See also ftp://medical.nema.org/Medical/Dicom/Palettes/spring.dcm
Summer (SUMMER) from section B.1.6. See also ftp://medical.nema.org/Medical/Dicom/Palettes/summer.dcm
Fall (FALL) from section B.1.7. See also ftp://medical.nema.org/Medical/Dicom/Palettes/fall.dcm
Winter (WINTER) from section B.1.8. See also ftp://medical.nema.org/Medical/Dicom/Palettes/winter.dcm
